quote_first: “Oh, Daddy,” I said. Blubbering now. “He’s not dead. At least he wasn’t at
quote_last: this morning. We’ve got to dig him up. We have to, because we buried him alive.”
quote_raw: “Oh, Daddy,” I said. Blubbering now. “He’s not dead. At least he wasn’t at two-thirty this morning. We’ve got to dig him up. We have to, because we buried him alive.”
title: If It Bleeds
author: Stephen King

quote_last: . A few minutes to calm down before she had to go.
quote_raw: She looked at her watch: half past two. A few minutes to calm down before she had to go.
title: The Locked Room
author: Maj Sjöwall & Per Wahlöö

quote_first:
I'm in mufti myself: white gloves and matching tennis shoes. But I'm sorry to report that Jo is still in her Dr. Dentons. What're you wearing, Shirl?
"My old drum majorette's outfit. The one I wore to the State Finals. Listen, we can't tie up the phones like this."
"Why not?" said Harry. "Who's going to call at
quote_last:
with a better idea? Yippee, to quote Lew, we're having a party! What're we serving, Lew?"
"Beer, I guess. Haven't got any wine, have we, Jo?"
"Just for cooking."
quote_raw:
I'm in mufti myself: white gloves and matching tennis shoes. But I'm sorry to report that Jo is still in her Dr. Dentons. What're you wearing, Shirl?
"My old drum majorette's outfit. The one I wore to the State Finals. Listen, we can't tie up the phones like this."
"Why not?" said Harry. "Who's going to call at 2:30 a.m. with a better idea? Yippee, to quote Lew, we're having a party! What're we serving, Lew?"
"Beer, I guess. Haven't got any wine, have we, Jo?"
"Just for cooking."
title: The Night People
author: Jack Finney

quote_last: she had been woken by the creak of footsteps out on the stairs. At first she had been frightened.
quote_raw: At about half past two she had been woken by the creak of footsteps out on the stairs. At first she had been frightened.
title: The Little Stranger
author: Sarah Waters

quote_first: Inc, I tried to pull her off about
quote_last: , and there was this fucking… sound.
quote_raw: Inc, I tried to pull her off about 0230, and there was this fucking… sound.
title: Infinite Jest
author: David Foster Wallace

quote_last: and I am tight. As a tick, as a lord, as a newt. Must write this down before the sublime memories fade and blur.
quote_raw: It is 2.30 am and I am tight. As a tick, as a lord, as a newt. Must write this down before the sublime memories fade and blur.
title: Any Human Heart
author: William Boyd
